Html: Launch a fresh download of Rawr 2.0, select Mage. Don't load anything.  Equip Boots of Incantations with a Runed Crimson Spinel.  Your Spell Damage should be 59. Now Equip Boots of Incantations with a Reckless Pyrestone.  Your Spell Damage should be 55, but it's 53.  47 from the boots, plus 12 or (6 + 2 = 8).
We fixed this already. We forgot to update spell damage on socket bonuses to spell power.
Is this something I'll need to wait for the next release to fix, or can I monkey with the item definition?
I think you can change it in item cache xml by replacing all SpellDamage with SpellPower, but there'll be a new release tonight so it's up to you.

I don't think this is specific to Rawr.Mage, but it's the only caster-model I've tested so far, so I post it here.
After updating item cache from armory, all SpellPower on items is gone, even for gems.
